markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Collar of Inconspicuousness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=405)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 604 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 475 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn collar

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This leather collar’s worn and almost threadbare look belies its magical nature. When your companion wears and invests the collar, it gains the ability to change its appearance from that of a ferocious animal into a more inconspicuous form.

<document level="2" id="action-232" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Collar of Inconspicuousness
